data:
Letter of Appointment


1st January 2022,

To

Mr Manish Dash Sharma

Chandra Reddy layout ,Channasandra

Kadugodi Post, Bangalore-560067

 

 Dear Manish,


Sub: Letter of Appointment

Ref: Your acceptance of Offer Letter dated  1st January 2022


We are pleased to appoint you in D’Well Informatics & Services Pvt. Ltd. (the “Company”) as “Executive ( IT )”. You will directly report to Managing Director Mr Thomas George in our Company’s office at U.B.City, Level 11,Canberra, # 24 Vittal Mallya Road, Bangalore - 560 001 India; on the following terms & conditions, subject to successful confirmation of your employment. Your appointment date shall commence on 1st January 2022.

1. You will be paid gross emoluments as detailed in Annexures– A. 


  1. You will be on training for an initial period of three (3) months and on probation for a period of six (6) months from the date of commencement of training. On successful completion of your training and based on the availability of a position, your transition from trainee to probationary will be made on the basis of your appraisal at the end of the period of training.


  1. It is mandatory for you to submit self-attested copies of your Original Documents given below to the Company during your training, probation, confirmation and appraisal period:


  1. 3 Photographs

  2. Certificate of your highest qualification

  3. Passport, if any  

  4. Driving license, if any  

  5. Aadhar Card 

  6. Pancard 

  7. Bank account details (Passbook and Cancelled cheque leaf)

  8. Medical Certificate issued by a Medical Practitioner

  9. Experience Certificate, if any

  10. Details of previous EPF account, if any.

  11. Relieving order from the previous employer, if any

The Company shall have the right to verify these copies with originals at any time desirable.

4. You shall not receive any presents, gifts, commissions, advances, loans or any other sort of gratifications or benefits in cash or kind from any person, party or firm or company associated with the Company. If you are offered the same, you shall immediately report such matters to the Company in writing.


5.You shall not be allowed to work in any other organization, or be a freelancer or conduct any type of business during the training, probation and employment period without the permission of the management.


6. You shall undertake and agree that all property including all correspondence addressed to or by you i.e., specifications, vouchers, literatures, books, circulars, articles, goods, etc. or property of any nature whatsoever belonging to the Company or relating to the Company’s business which shall come into your possession in the course of your employment or otherwise shall be held by you as a trustee for the Company and the same shall be returned/ delivered to the Company on-demand or in the event of your termination of employment.

1. You will not, whether in the training, probation or confirmation period of  employment with the Company or later at any time, without the consent of the Company in writing, disclose, divulge or make public, except under legal obligations, accounts, transactions or dealings of the Company which ought not be disclosed or made public whether the same be confided to you or become known to you in the course of your employment with the Company or otherwise.


  1. Your appointment has been made based on information furnished by you. However, if there is a discrepancy in the copies of documents or certificates given by you as proof of above the Company retains the right to review your appointment.


  1. Employment as per this appointment letter is subject to you being and remaining physically and mentally fit. The management shall have the right to get you medically examined periodically by a registered medical practitioner of their choice, whose opinion on your fitness or otherwise shall be final and binding.

  2. Your training, probation, and confirmation will be subject to the rules and regulations of the Company, in force or as framed from time to time.

  3. The terms and conditions of the offer letter dated 1st January 2022 not mentioned in this letter are binding and applicable to your employment with the Company. Please sign and return a dated copy of this letter as an indication of your acceptance along with the copy of your photo ID proof not later than two (2) days.

The Company congratulates you on your appointment and wishes you a long and successful career with the Company. The Company is confident that your contribution will take the Company further in our journey towards becoming leaders in the industry. 


The Company welcomes you and looks forward to your contribution to the growth of the  Company and yourself. 



For D’Well Informatics & Services Pvt. Ltd

AUTHORIZED SIGNATORY



Name: Agnes Jerry


Date: 1st April 2022


Place: Bangalore





Annexure– A

1. Salary structures will be bifurcated as under:


Basic Pay

Rs. 12857/-per month

Cost of Living Allowance (COLA)

Nil

House Rent Allowances (40% of Basic Pay)

Rs. 5143/- per month

Medical Allowances

Based on Insurance

Conveyance Allowances

Actuals for Duty

Production Bonus 

10% of basic salary (Minimum)

Other Allowances

7000 (Based on Performance)

Total

Rs. 25000/- per month

Deductions


Professional Tax 

Based on Applicable laws

Leave Salary

Based on the Rules of the Company

P.F.

Based on PF Rules

TDS

Based on IT Rules

Others

Nil



  1. Retirals

1. You shall participate in the Company’s Provident Fund Scheme as applicable to your category of employees.


  1. You shall be entitled to gratuity in accordance with the rules governing such payment.


  1. Salary Revision


Your salary will be reviewed on January 1st of each year, or at such other time as the Management may decide. Salary revisions are discretionary and will be subject to, and made on the basis of, effective performance and results.


  1. Insurance Policy


We provide health and personal accident cover for all employees to be discussed and disclosed from time to time.
Signature of Employee: Manish Dash Sharma
